Title: The Original
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by), Jonathan Nolan (teleplay), Lisa Joy (teleplay), Jonathan Nolan (story), Lisa Joy (story), Michael Crichton (story)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: The park staff begin to notice strange behavior from the hosts; A mysterious Man in Black roams the park, wreaking havoc.
